ygData.subject: Macroing skills
ygData.msgSnippet: I read from the net that tat are few wulu wulu places which allow us to macro some skills like swiming. Some pools are so shallow that when we sleep, we can
ygData.messageBody:
I read from the net that tat are few wulu wulu places which allow us to
macro some skills like swiming.

Some pools are so shallow that when we sleep, we can set our char auto
forward swiming. Thou stamina will drop, we will not drown when we stop
swiming since the pool is shallow. I dunno those wulu wulu place mentioned
but wonder any any kakis got lobang near FP? If yes I can leave my PC on
and macro swimming. They say when u reach master swimmer, u can swim
faster than u run, LOL.

FYI, fishing is another macro-able skills using the fishing bot.

If there is any more macro-able skills, pls share share hor ;)

Ziltus
